moves.name: Stomping Tantrum
moves.effect: Its power is doubled if the user’s previous move failed.

moves.name: This Match Is Too Fun!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Speed and Critical Rate. These stats are sharply raised when the user is in a sandstorm.

syncMove.name: Earthquake of Ancient Lore
syncMove.description: Become Mega Garchomp until the end of battle.

passives.name: Hit and Run 2
passives.description: Occasionally raises the Pokémon’s Speed after it uses a move.

passives.name: Surging Sand 5
passives.description: Powers up moves in a sandstorm.
